abstract: With a market value of about $460 billion, Apple was worth more than Google, Goldman Sachs, General Motors, Ford, Starbucks and Boeing combined.
snippet: With a market value of about $460 billion, Apple was worth more than Google, Goldman Sachs, General Motors, Ford, Starbucks and Boeing combined.
lead_paragraph: 5:26 p.m. | Updated to reflect Thursday’s closing stock prices.

headline.main: Apple Stock’s Lofty Heights, in Context
